EmailTemplate.description: This email is to be sent out as a Thank you email when a lead completes the form.
EmailTemplate.name: ES Talk To Us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{First Name:default=Sir/Maddam}},
Thank you for your interest in speaking to us about MBO Enterprise Solutions.
We look forward to reaching out to you to set up a time to speak and see how we might help your business agenda.
Please expect to hear a follow up from someone on my business team.
Regards,
Dave Putt 703-793-6020 Dputt@mbopartners.com
